about_the_game:
"A covenant for enternity, A sword to succeed."

In the high of Mount Taishan, there is a deep valley that never been known, isolated to the motral world. Time pass by without noticed, young Shen Zi-Jun wondering about the mortal world far away, never know the peaceful life will come to an end in a accident…



Being guided by the unseen destiny, he will take on a adventure to heaven and deep, to discover a great ancient secret , a dream to be forgotten long long ago , a promise cannot be keep, a sword to conceal too much mystery.


Once the wheel of destiny begin to spin again ,he will be lead to the end of the lost legend, only in the deep of infinity high clouds, he will get back to his true self…

[The scenario]
Being the most important core element of a classic RPG, the scenario of “The Forgotten Concluder” was written and plotted by famous Chinese fantasy game writer Quester Yeh that ever made the “Kalpa: The forbidden divines”, with over 400,000 words of carefully written dialog to spell out a detailed and amazing Chinese wu-xia fantasy world, to tell a great and fun story that base on ancient Chinese legend from heaven to earth.



[The battle mode]

The semi-realtime battle mode used in “Kalpa: The Forbidden Divines” has been renewaled and add more character elements to make the battle more dynamic and exciting. Player can command maximum 5 characters to fight against maximum 10 enemies in real time basis, making decision in seconds to gain victory over strong opponent by using Strategies wisely.



[The game World]
A detailed and vivid world to explore is the essence of RPG, although limited by the 3D engine ability, the team contrived to remake the true looking in the time of Song Dynasty by researching history and carefully modelling the building and characters, other game scenes will include wonders location that deep into the earth or high in the clouds, in additional to the marvellous looking that above the imaginations, there are a variety of puzzles and mechanism triggers that wait for players to solve.
detailed_description:
Just Updated

To players,
It is with great pleasure that we announce the official release of "The Forgotten Concluder" on Steam.
We are grateful for your attention and thankful for this encounter.
After months of intense preparation and 20 years of struggles, "The Forgotten Concluder" has finally met with its audience.
It is undeniable that fate has played a part, allowing the game to be successfully initiated 7 years ago and enabling a team of "veteran game developers" in their fifties to start from scratch and create a large-scale 3D project.
We are grateful for the opportunities that fate has presented, allowing us to convey the story of Shen Zijun and his companions through the form of Role-Playing Game.
With a script of 400,000 words, various main and sub-plots, as well as an abundance of puzzles and hidden elements, we hope that players can piece together and explore the intricacies of the game world through the power of words.
We would like to express our gratitude to the many passionate fans and players who have provided tremendous assistance during the development process, working tirelessly to debug the game. It is thanks to their contributions that the game was able to be released before Labor Day.
We would also like to thank fate for introducing us to two passionate voice directors, over 60 voice actors , and numerous volunteers . Despite the large amount of dialogue, and the lack of sufficient funds to dub every word, they persevered and completed nearly 100,000 words of the script through multiple recording sessions.
We are grateful that you have taken an interest in "The Forgotten Concluder".
Although it is not a perfect game, it possesses a retro charm that is not representative of the times, and the character model and action design are also outdated compared to other games of the same genre.
We hope that players can gradually experience the changes in the protagonist's mentality and the various events he experienced along the way in the slow-burning plot, and gain insights at the end.
The revenue generated from the game's release will be used to optimize the game for a better gaming experience.
We thank you for your understanding and for patiently waiting.
If you encounter any problems during the game, please feel free to join the player group and provide feedback QQ Group :772611363 or Facebook：霸劍霄雲錄
Gameplay strategies can be found on the fan strategy group's Weibo: 霸剑霄云录攻略组

short_description: “The Forgotten Concluder” is a third person perspective 3D Role-playing game base on the ancient Chinese fantasy wu-xia world. Being a young teenager Shen Zi-Jun that grew in a isolated valley, taking on a adventure to discover a great secret and his true dentity.
